title: How to Get Secret Dresspheres in Final Fantasy X‐2

steps.headline: Know that the Berserker dressphere is very easy to get but it's hard to find out exactly where it is.
In chapter 3, get on your airship and visit Macalania.
steps.description: Make sure your characters are leveled up enough to fight multiple monsters without breaks.

steps.headline: Once you arrive in Macalania, immediately you are forced into doing a sub-mission called "Protect the agency".
Defeat all the enemies (six battles) and this dressphere is yours!
Understand that the Gun Mage dressphere is a useful dressphere that can be used to inflict high damage on certain monster types and best of all, It's very easy to obtain!
In chapter 1, go to the Moonflow and speak with Tobli.
Accept Tobli's side-mission Shave the Hypello.
steps.description: It's a fairly easy side-quest but still pretty fun.

steps.headline: Complete it and this dressphere is yours!
Alternatively, in Chapter 2, go to the Moonflow and speak with Tobli.
steps.description: He offers you a sphere in exchange for selling tickets to his show. Complete this short side-quest and he gives you this dressphere.

steps.headline: When you're doing the Pest control mission in Kilika temple, kill two Daevas in the forced battles.
steps.description: Now as you descend down the stairs, look carefully. The dressphere should be on the floor.

steps.headline: Go to Kilika.
Get either Episode complete or concluded, either one doesn't matter.
Enter the temple trials and start opening the chests.
steps.description: One of them contains this dressphere.

steps.headline: Trainer is a very useful dressphere and is very easy to acquire but you must know exactly where you get it.
At Chapter 2, visit Kimahri on Mount Gagazet and talk to him twice.
When he asks you a question, pick the 2nd choice.
Now in chapter 3, there will be a mission on Mount Gagazet.
steps.description: Go there and speak with Kimahri and he will hand over this awesome dressphere.

steps.headline: You can obtain this dressphere in either Chapter 3 or 5.
Visit Luca and enter the Sphere Break tournament.
Win 2 matches then save your game (make sure to save)
Win your third match.
steps.description: If you don't, restart your game.

steps.headline: You will now have to face the geek Shinra.
steps.description: Beat Shinra and this Dressphere is yours.

steps.headline: If you don't win at CH3, you can visit Luca and find Shinra in the Sphere break halls in CH5.
steps.description: Challenge him and win and the dressphere is yours.

steps.headline: The Mascot dressphere is the one dressphere that thousands of players have never acquired.
steps.description: The reason for this is the difficulty of acquiring it. Be sure to be leveled up well before attempting to get this DS.

steps.headline: It's very simple--get episode complete in every area of Spira in Chapter 5.
steps.description: DO NOT LEAVE ZANARKAND HOTSPOT  FOR LAST, you must make sure that this is the first area you complete. (Completing Via Infinito, Bridal mission, Fiend Colony Dungeon and Ruin Depths are not required to get this Dressphere)

steps.headline: Know that the dressphere  dark Knight  is very powerful and hard to find out exactly where it is
There are two opportunities to obtain this dress sphere, once in chapter 3 and again in 5.
In chapter 3 when you are in the bevelle underground there is a junction with three lifts.
steps.description: you reach this just before the encounter with baralai.

steps.headline: Take the right lift up and when your at the top look for a place where you can jump back down to the junction without using a lift (its near the bottom and kind of hard to find) and jump down.
In the junction take the middle lift to a small secret area and jump on the platform that is there, this will trigger a switch.
Take the left platform to back to the top floor, go all the way to the right and take the right lift back down to the junction.
Use the middle lift to go up to a second small secret area and jump on the platform there as well,opening up the second hidden switch.
steps.description: This will open the path to the dark knight dress sphere.

steps.headline: If you miss getting this dress sphere in ch3 you can come back in ch5 to claim it.
Find your way into the bevelle underground by using the lifts, the process will be identical except there will be no bosses.

text: Berserker Know that the Berserker dressphere is very easy to get but it's hard to find out exactly where it is.  In chapter 3, get on your airship and visit Macalania. Make sure your characters are leveled up enough to fight multiple monsters without breaks. Once you arrive in Macalania, immediately you are forced into doing a sub-mission called "Protect the agency".  Defeat all the enemies (six battles) and this dressphere is yours!  Gun Mage Understand that the Gun Mage dressphere is a useful dressphere that can be used to inflict high damage on certain monster types and best of all, It's very easy to obtain!  In chapter 1, go to the Moonflow and speak with Tobli.  Accept Tobli's side-mission Shave the Hypello. It's a fairly easy side-quest but still pretty fun. Complete it and this dressphere is yours!  Alternatively, in Chapter 2, go to the Moonflow and speak with Tobli. He offers you a sphere in exchange for selling tickets to his show. Complete this short side-quest and he gives you this dressphere. Samurai When you're doing the Pest control mission in Kilika temple, kill two Daevas in the forced battles. Now as you descend down the stairs, look carefully. The dressphere should be on the floor. Go to Kilika.  Get either Episode complete or concluded, either one doesn't matter.  Enter the temple trials and start opening the chests. One of them contains this dressphere. Trainer Trainer is a very useful dressphere and is very easy to acquire but you must know exactly where you get it.  At Chapter 2, visit Kimahri on Mount Gagazet and talk to him twice.  When he asks you a question, pick the 2nd choice.  Now in chapter 3, there will be a mission on Mount Gagazet. Go there and speak with Kimahri and he will hand over this awesome dressphere. Lady Luck You can obtain this dressphere in either Chapter 3 or 5.  Visit Luca and enter the Sphere Break tournament.  Win 2 matches then save your game (make sure to save)  Win your third match. If you don't, restart your game. You will now have to face the geek Shinra. Beat Shinra and this Dressphere is yours. If you don't win at CH3, you can visit Luca and find Shinra in the Sphere break halls in CH5. Challenge him and win and the dressphere is yours. Mascot The Mascot dressphere is the one dressphere that thousands of players have never acquired. The reason for this is the difficulty of acquiring it. Be sure to be leveled up well before attempting to get this DS. It's very simple--get episode complete in every area of Spira in Chapter 5. DO NOT LEAVE ZANARKAND HOTSPOT  FOR LAST, you must make sure that this is the first area you complete. (Completing Via Infinito, Bridal mission, Fiend Colony Dungeon and Ruin Depths are not required to get this Dressphere) Dark Knight Know that the dressphere  dark Knight  is very powerful and hard to find out exactly where it is  There are two opportunities to obtain this dress sphere, once in chapter 3 and again in 5.  In chapter 3 when you are in the bevelle underground there is a junction with three lifts. you reach this just before the encounter with baralai. Take the right lift up and when your at the top look for a place where you can jump back down to the junction without using a lift (its near the bottom and kind of hard to find) and jump down.  In the junction take the middle lift to a small secret area and jump on the platform that is there, this will trigger a switch. go back to the junction. Take the left platform to back to the top floor, go all the way to the right and take the right lift back down to the junction.  Use the middle lift to go up to a second small secret area and jump on the platform there as well,opening up the second hidden switch. This will open the path to the dark knight dress sphere. If you miss getting this dress sphere in ch3 you can come back in ch5 to claim it.  Find your way into the bevelle underground by using the lifts, the process will be identical except there will be no bosses.
